Tecplot ADK Reference

This document contains the function and function callback prototypes used by AddOns to control Tecplot. 

For discussions of how to create add-ons or how to perform basic operations using addons see the "Tecplot ADK Users Manual" (adkrm.pdf).  For complete examples of building addons see the "Tecplot ADK Getting Results Manual" (adkgr.pdf).

Click on the "Globals" link above to go to the lists of types, function prototypes, and defines.
